Class JRMIConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.Connection
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.JRMIConnection
public class JRMIConnection extends Connection
Class that represents the connection via JRMI, see Connection

      public void asyncKeepAliveEcho(int echoMillisDelay)
      Description copied from class: Connection
      Method in charge of sending periodic pings to the server during idle periods. This will prevent channel closure, confirming the client is still online

      Parameters:

    • getAvailableGames

      public Map<String,int[]> getAvailableGames() throws RemoteException
      Description copied from class: Connection
      Get a list of all available games
      Specified by:
      getAvailableGames in class Connection
      Returns:
      a Map, the key is the game id and the value is an array of two integers, the first is the num of players connected, the second is the num of players required

      RemoteException

    • createGame

      public ResponseStatus createGame(String gameID, String username, int numPlayers) throws RemoteException, NotBoundException
      Description copied from class: Connection
      Creates a new game and connects to it
      Specified by:
      createGame in class Connection
      Parameters:
      gameID - unique gameID to be associated to the game which we create
      username - the username for the player with which the client will connect
      numPlayers - the number of players for the game
      Returns:
      the status of the request, can be SUCCESS, GAME_ID_TAKEN if the gameID is already taken
      Throws:
      NotBoundException - in case of remote object unavailable
      RemoteException

    • connectToGame

      public ResponseStatus connectToGame(String gameID, String username, boolean rejoining) throws RemoteException, NotBoundException
      Description copied from class: Connection
      Connects to an existing game with the given gameID and username
      Specified by:
      connectToGame in class Connection
      Parameters:
      gameID - the ID of the game to connect to
      username - the username for the player with which the client will connect
      rejoining - whether we are attempting to rejoin an existing game session or we are joining for the first time
      Returns:
      the status of the request, can be SUCCESS, NO_SUCH_GAME_ID if the gameID doesn't exist, SELECTED_GAME_FULL if the game is already full or USERNAME_TAKEN if the username is already taken. When rejoining a game, also USERNAME_NOT_IN_GAME is a possible response status message, informing us that we are trying to rejoin with a username which doesn't exist.
      Throws:
      NotBoundException - in case of remote object unavailable
      RemoteException

    • waitTurn

      public SharedGameState waitTurn() throws RemoteException
      Description copied from class: Connection
      This method awaits for the game state to be updated by the server. This should be called over and over again in a loop, until the returned SharedGameState indicates that it's the player's turn.
      Specified by:
      waitTurn in class Connection
      Throws:
      RemoteException
